title: Warhol's Mother's script
content:
Does anyone know a good script that looks like Andy Warhol's mother's handwriting?

I found some information about a font called Warhol by Pepe Gimeno, which won a Type Director's award in 2001, but haven't been able to find it online.

Thanks.

J

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Warhol.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130728112831/http:/typophile.com/files/Warhol.gif) | 45.13 KB |
| [Warhold.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20130728112831/http:/typophile.com/files/Warhold.gif) | 8.29 KB |
author: jmickel

comments.content:
I did one virtually identical to this for a publisher. It is called Warhola.

Here you go:

[http://typenav.fontshop.com/index.asp?s=2](http://web.archive.org/web/20130728112831/http:/typenav.fontshop.com/index.asp?s=2 "http://typenav.fontshop.com/index.asp?s=2")

Nick Cooke
